features: 【Perfect Desk Accessory】 Combine headphone stand and power strip to one device, provide you more function - conveniently store your not-in-use headphones, power you devices and organize your desk space.

【Power Strip with 3 AC Outlets】The headphone stand can be used as a power strip, is with build-in 3 power sockets, total output is 1250W, suitable for home and office, charging laptops, printers, pc monitor, Xbox PS4 game devices, TV, lamp and other devices powerfully and effectively. The stick can be removed.

【2 USB-A + 1 USB-C Smart Chargers】 Total 2 USB-A + 1 USB-C port for charging your mobile phone, tablet, e-reader, wireless headset and other USB charging devices. It can detect different device Intelligently and automatically, provides the fastest charging speed up to 2.4A per port or 3A overall, be convenient and save time.

【RGB Lighting & Touch Control】 This RGB headset holder provides 2 lighting modes and 6 kinds of lighting effects, multi-color flowing modes and single color breathing modes (red, green, blue, purple, light off), to create a cool gaming atmosphere. Easily choose the color you like with the touch sensor switch. Perfect gaming desk accessories gifts for gamers, men.

【Safely and Easily Use】Hardened plastic outer shell of has excellent durability and this headphone hanger is with build-in one button for connecting or cutting off all circuitry and power supply, convenient and safe. The headset stand is detachable, make it be portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic stand for your headphones with great features!
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed when I took it out of the box was the stand it self. Cheap basic plastic. Once you put it together and secure it to the base, is sturdy and functional. But, once you place your headphones, it's the one thing you never notice. I was very impressed with the base of the stand. It's heavy and very functional. The two USB ports and the type C port work very well, and allow me to keep everything else organized. My Samsung wireless earbuds, my Amazon watch and the most important device, my headphones. I bought the Odio A70 and I love them so much. They fit on my stand perfectly and having a short cable and out of the way made it more attractive. I also charged my water pick and also a pair of neck fans without having a huge mess of cables all over the place because I had short cables available. For the price, it was more than I was expecting. My daughter, my son and my girlfriend want one. Once my girlfriend saw the RGB lights, that made her want one for her PS5 headphones. It adds a nice touch to your night stand or your computer desk if you're into gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lights, extra outlets/plus, oh, and it holds the headphones!
reviews.reviewText: After researching a lot of options for a headphone stand, this was by far the most multipurpose, functional, and attractive. The LED lights are a nice complement to the lights on my headphones. I constantly use the USB plugs to both charge my headphones and other devices. Having extra outlets on top of that is just a great bonus. The stand itself is a plastic bar that sticks in the base, and it swivels a bit, so maybe not the most sturdy option, but it's more than fine for just resting and charging my headphones. I'm very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Product and Best Value
reviews.reviewText: This headset stand is the best, has everything I wanted and more. It holds the headset, but also has usb for charging the wireless ones. The surge protector and elector plugs make it convenient to charge other gaming things at the same time. It is also much cheaper than most of the PC accessory name brand like Razer, but offers more than they do. It also has different color glow modes if that makes a difference to your purchase. Fantastic buy, people need to know more about these honestly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice headphone stand
reviews.reviewText: The unit assembles easy and seems to be good quality. The usb charging ports and 110 plugs all work and charge accessories well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Husband loves this! He uses it daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like how it’s compact and simple. I connected a small usb cable to charge my headphones and it looks nice and simple. I also have used it to charge my iPhone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband and he loves it! He loved the added plug ins without having to give up space on his desk and the lights are an added bonus. The power supply charges both of our phones quickly and the stand it's self is sturdy. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful stand for price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stand for my new wireless headset. This is such a sleek design with 3 3prong plugs, 2 USB and 1 USB-C adapters. It takes little room on my desk and is so nice because I cant just rest my headset on it and charge it over night.Assembly was just fitting one piece in the other. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: Stable stand with nice options and a good price.
reviews.reviewText: Got this due to getting a new headset and wanted to save some desk space. Super easy assembly, just insert the center rod and twist and it's done. Love having the 3 extra usb and plug in spots as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great headset stand, check your plugs first
reviews.reviewText: Overall, it's a great headset stand and power outlet, and the RGB is a nice touch. I bought for my Xbox headset, and to plug my tv, box and Android TV box into. The only issue with it is it's size, the outlets are closer together, so I couldn't fit all three, since the power brick was too large for my Android TV.
